wrap;max-width:80rem;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;padding-left:2rem;padding-right:2rem}}.site-content__layout>*{margin-bottom:2rem}@media (max-width:899px){.site-content__layout>*{margin-bottom:1rem}}.site-content__layout>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.site-content__layout .content-area{width:100%}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:2rem}@media (max-width:899px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area{padding-right:2.5rem;width:calc(100% - 300px)}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:100%}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:18.75rem}}.site-content__layout--full-width .content-area{width:100%}.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:0;padding-right:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:1rem}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:2rem;padding-right:1rem}.site-content__layout--app *{margin-bottom:0;margin-top:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:0}}.site-content__layout--app .site-main{background:-webkit-gradient(linear,left top,right top,from(#bdcadb),color-stop(20%,#d8e4f2),color-stop(47%,#deeaf8),color-stop(72%,#d8e4f3),to(#c1cedf));background:-o-linear-gradient(left,#bdcadb 0,#d8e4f2 20%,#deeaf8 47%,#d8e4f3 72%,#c1cedf 72%,#c1cedf)}.site-content--has-story-package-hero{max-width:100%;overflow-x:hidden}.widget-area{position:relative;z-index:1}.widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}.widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.widget-area .article-list__heading,.widget-area .widget-title{font-family:Roboto Condensed,arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;text-transform:uppercase;text-align:center;width:100%}@media (min-width:64rem){.widget-area img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile){height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:56.25%;position:relative;background-color:#ebebeb}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile)           <div class="dropnav__section dropnav__section--article-list dropnav__section--quarter">
           <div class="article-list article-list--top-story">
            <h3 class="article-list__heading">
             Top Stories
            </h3>
            <div class="article-list__content">
             <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">
               <h4 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/health/coronavirus-local-impact/mass-mutual-prepares-to-hold-events-by-the-end-of-april/">
                 MassMutual prepares to hold events by the end of April
                </a>
               </h4>
              </div>
              <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/health/coronavirus-local-impact/mass-mutual-prepares-to-hold-events-by-the-end-of-april/">

                 </div>
                 <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
                  <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
                   <svg height="13" viewbox="0 0 11 13" width="11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

                    </path>
                   </svg>
                  </span>

              </figure>

           <div class="article-list article-list--top-story">
            <h3 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--hidden">
             Top Stories
            </h3>
            <div class="article-list__content">
             <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">
               <h4 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/massappeal/easter-treats-and-toys-with-limor-suss/">

                </a>

     <div class="site-content__layout site-content__layout--has-sidebar">
      <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--hero-full" data-module-type="standard layout" id="standard-layout">
       <h2 class="article-list__heading screen-reader-text">
        Headlines
       </h2>
       <div class="article-list__content">
        <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type main-story-link" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="803152" data-collection="article-list1" data-index="0">
         <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list1" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context="[]">
          <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
           <a class="article-list__article-link main-story-link" data-link-label="MassMutual prepares to hold events by the end of April" data-link-pinned="true" data-link-position="0" data-link-type="standard-main-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/health/coronavirus-local-impact/mass-mutual-prepares-to-hold-events-by-the-end-of-april/">
            MassMutual prepares to hold events by the end of April
           </a>
          </h3>
          <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
           <a class="article-list__article-category-link category-link-0" data-link-label="Coronavirus Local Impact" data-link-pinned="true" data-link-position="0" data-link-type="standard-category-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/health/coronavirus-local-impact/">
            Coronavirus Local Impact
           </a>
           /
           <time datetime="2021-03-21T23:18:57-04:00">
            6 hours ago
           </time>
          </footer>
         </div>
         <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
          <a class="article-list__article-link main-story-link" data-link-label="https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2017/12/web-massmutual_center_38458904_ver1.0.jpg?w=650&amp;h=366&amp;crop=1" data-link-pinned="true" data-link-position="0" data-link-type="standard-main-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/health/coronavirus-local-impact/mass-mutual-prepares-to-hold-events-by-the-end-of-april/">
           <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
            <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6458315">

           <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>
            <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/local-news/hampden-county/ymca-of-westfield-will-offer-free-physical-activity-for-cancer-survivors/">
              YMCA of Westfield will offer free physical activity for cancer survivors
             </a>
            </h3>
            <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
             <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/local-news/hampden-county/">
              Hampden County
             </a>
             /
             <time datetime="2021-03-21T13:43:46-04:00">
              16 hours ago
             </time>
            </footer>
           </div>
           <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
            <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/local-news/hampden-county/ymca-of-westfield-will-offer-free-physical-activity-for-cancer-survivors/">
             <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
              <div class="image-wrapper square">
               <img alt="ymca-logo_551873" loading="lazy" sizes="50px" src="https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2017/02/ymca-logo_37012393_ver1.0.jpg?w=600&amp;h=366&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2017/02/ymca-logo_37012393_ver1.0.jpg?w=100&amp;h=100&amp;crop=1 100w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2017/02/ymca-logo_37012393_ver1.0.jpg?w=200&amp;h=200&amp;crop=1 200w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2017/02/ymca-logo_37012393_ver1.0.jpg?w=300&amp;h=300&amp;crop=1 300w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2017/02/ymca-logo_37012393_ver1.0.jpg?w=600&amp;h=366&amp;crop=1 600w"/>
              </div>
             </div>
            </a>
           </figure>
          </article>
          <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="802992" data-collection="article-list2" data-index="9">
           <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>
            <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/a-rapid-covid-19-vaccine-rollout-backfired-in-some-us-states/">

             </a>
            </h3>

              News
             </a>

             </time>
            </footer>

            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list3" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">

            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list3" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">

319_6453357__The_Friends_Experience__returns_to_NYC_3000.mp4&quot;,&quot;enableFloatingPlayer&quot;:true},&quot;disableMutedAutoplay&quot;:false,&quot;recommendations&quot;:true,&quot;expectPreroll&quot;:true,&quot;titleVisible&quot;:true,&quot;pauseOnClick&quot;:true,&quot;trackTimePeriod&quot;:60}"          <section class="article-list article-list-carousel article-list-carousel--dropin video-playlist video-playlist--carousel" data-component="videoPlaylist" data-context="carousel_dropin--video">
          <h2 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--notched">
           COPING WITH COVID on WWLP.com
          </h2>
          <div class="article-list__content">

                </span>
                <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">
                 Video
                </span>
               </span>
              </div>
             </a>
            </figure>
           </article>

                 Video

              </div>
             </a>
            </figure>

          </div>
          <div class="article-list__read-more article-list__read-more--w-arrow">
           <a href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/health/coronavirus-local-impact/">
            More Coronavirus Local Impact
            <span class="icon icon--arrow">
             <svg viewbox="0 0 17.938 10.94" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
              <path d="M17.944 5.55a.733.733 0 0 1-.032.34v.03c0 .01-.006.01-.008.01a.189.189 0 0 1-.028.05.619.619 0 0 1-.123.17c-.009.01-.013.02-.023.03l-4.927 4.56a.733.733 0 0 1-.5.19.753.753 0 0 1-.54-.23.737.737 0 0 1 .041-1.04l3.547-3.28H.738a.735.735 0 1 1 0-1.47h14.693l-3.74-3.68a.735.735 0 0 1 1.03-1.05l5.022 4.94s0 .01.008.01a.016.016 0 0 0 .017.01.8.8 0 0 1 .163.32c.007.03.009.06.013.09z">
              </path>
             </svg>
            </span>
           </a>
          </div>
         </section>
        </section>
        <section class="widget_text widget widget--has-z-index-stacking-reset widget_custom_html" data-component="dropzoneWidget" id="custom_html-11">
         <div class="textwidget custom-html-widget">
          <div class="rich-text-cascade">
           <style>
            .widget-title {display:none;}
           </style>

               <h3 class="article-list__article-title">

                </a>
               </h3>
               <footer class="article-list__article-meta">

                <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                 <div class="image-wrapper square vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6457928">

              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list5" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>
               <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/local-news/hampden-county/stop-the-spread-covid-19-testing-locations-in-holyoke-closed-due-to-inclement-weather/">

                </a>
               </h3>
               <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
                <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/local-news/hampden-county/">
                 Hampden County
                </a>
                /
                <time datetime="2021-03-18T12:21:04-04:00">
                 4 days ago
                </time>
               </footer>
              </div>
              <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/local-news/hampden-county/stop-the-spread-covid-19-testing-locations-in-holyoke-closed-due-to-inclement-weather/">
                <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                 <div class="image-wrapper square">
                  <img alt="" loading="lazy" sizes="50px" src="https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2020/09/hcc-testing.jpg?w=600&amp;h=366&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2020/09/hcc-testing.jpg?w=100&amp;h=100&amp;crop=1 100w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2020/09/hcc-testing.jpg?w=200&amp;h=200&amp;crop=1 200w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2020/09/hcc-testing.jpg?w=300&amp;h=300&amp;crop=1 300w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2020/09/hcc-testing.jpg?w=600&amp;h=366&amp;crop=1 600w"/>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </a>
              </figure>
             </article>
             <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="801055" data-collection="article-list5" data-index="6">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list5" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>

               <footer class="article-list__article-meta">

                </a>
                /
                <time datetime="2021-03-03T13:30:09-05:00">
                 3 weeks ago
                </time>
               </footer>
              </div>
              <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/local-news/hampden-county-regional-board-of-retirement-meeting-addresses-issues-from-recent-audit/">
                <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                 <div class="image-wrapper square">
                  <img alt="massachusetts state flag_1528319396065.jpg.jpg" loading="lazy" sizes="50px" src="https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2018/12/massachusetts20state20flag_1528319396065.jpg_44676869_ver1.0.jpg?w=600&amp;h=366&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2018/12/massachusetts20state20flag_1528319396065.jpg_44676869_ver1.0.jpg?w=100&amp;h=100&amp;crop=1 100w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2018/12/massachusetts20state20flag_1528319396065.jpg_44676869_ver1.0.jpg?w=200&amp;h=200&amp;crop=1 200w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2018/12/massachusetts20state20flag_1528319396065.jpg_44676869_ver1.0.jpg?w=300&amp;h=300&amp;crop=1 300w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2018/12/massachusetts20state20flag_1528319396065.jpg_44676869_ver1.0.jpg?w=600&amp;h=366&amp;crop=1 600w"/>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </a>
              </figure>
             </article>

            <div class="article-list__content">
             <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="802899" data-collection="article-list7" data-index="0">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list7" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>
               <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/csp-mass-man-arrested-for-dwi-crash-that-led-to-two-adults-three-juveniles-hospitalized/">
                 CSP: Mass. man arrested for DWI crash that led to two adults, three juveniles hospitalized
                </a>
               </h3>
               <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
                <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/">
                 News
                </a>
                /
                <time datetime="2021-03-21T04:25:18-04:00">
                 1 day ago
                </time>
               </footer>
              </div>
              <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/csp-mass-man-arrested-for-dwi-crash-that-led-to-two-adults-three-juveniles-hospitalized/">
                <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                 <div class="image-wrapper square">
                  <img alt="" loading="lazy" sizes="50px" src="https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2021/03/franky-sanchez.jpg?w=600&amp;h=493&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2021/03/franky-sanchez.jpg?w=100&amp;h=100&amp;crop=1 100w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2021/03/franky-sanchez.jpg?w=200&amp;h=200&amp;crop=1 200w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2021/03/franky-sanchez.jpg?w=300&amp;h=300&amp;crop=1 300w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2021/03/franky-sanchez.jpg?w=600&amp;h=493&amp;crop=1 600w"/>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </a>
              </figure>
             </article>
             <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="802509" data-collection="article-list7" data-index="1">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list7" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>

              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list7" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>
               <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/pres-biden-to-meet-with-asian-american-leaders-following-atlanta-spa-shootings/">
                 Biden, Harris speak out against rise in hate crimes against Asian Americans following Atlanta spa shootings
                </a>
               </h3>
               <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
                <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/">
                 News
                </a>
                /
                <time datetime="2021-03-19T20:10:36-04:00">
                 2 days ago
                </time>
               </footer>
              </div>
              <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/pres-biden-to-meet-with-asian-american-leaders-following-atlanta-spa-shootings/">
                <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                 <div class="image-wrapper square vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6455140">

              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list7" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>

              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list8" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>
               <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/the-cw-springfield/watch-crisis-on-infinite-earths-for-free-on-the-cw/">
                 Watch Crisis on Infinite Earths for free on The CW
                </a>
               </h3>
               <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
                <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/the-cw-springfield/">
                 The CW Springfield
                </a>
                /
                <time datetime="2019-12-15T20:27:43-05:00">
                 1 year ago
                </time>
               </footer>
              </div>
              <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/the-cw-springfield/watch-crisis-on-infinite-earths-for-free-on-the-cw/">
                <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                 <div class="image-wrapper square">
                  <img alt="" loading="lazy" sizes="50px" src="https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2019/12/SPG509b_BTS_0440r.jpg?w=600&amp;h=600&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2019/12/SPG509b_BTS_0440r.jpg?w=100&amp;h=100&amp;crop=1 100w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2019/12/SPG509b_BTS_0440r.jpg?w=200&amp;h=200&amp;crop=1 200w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2019/12/SPG509b_BTS_0440r.jpg?w=300&amp;h=300&amp;crop=1 300w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2019/12/SPG509b_BTS_0440r.jpg?w=600&amp;h=600&amp;crop=1 600w"/>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </a>
              </figure>
             </article>

              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list8" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>

             <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="801925" data-collection="article-list9" data-index="4">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list9" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>
               <h3 class="article-list__article-title">

              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list10" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>
               <h3 class="article-list__article-title">

                 Air travel increasing as Massachusetts travel advisory takes effect Monday
                </a>

                </a>

                 17 mins ago
                </time>

             <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="802205" data-collection="article-list10" data-index="1">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list10" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>
               <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/connecticut/three-wheeled-motorcycle-crash-on-route-5-in-enfield/">
                 Three-wheeled motorcycle crash on Route 5 in Enfield
                </a>
               </h3>
               <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
                <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/connecticut/">
                 Connecticut
                </a>
                /
                <time datetime="2021-03-19T15:02:35-04:00">
                 3 days ago
                </time>
               </footer>
              </div>
              <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/connecticut/three-wheeled-motorcycle-crash-on-route-5-in-enfield/">
                <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                 <div class="image-wrapper square">
                  <img alt="Enfield_Police_Vehicle_1525200234092.jpg" loading="lazy" sizes="50px" src="https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2019/05/Enfield_Police_Vehicle_1525200234092_41339697_ver1.0-1.jpg?w=600&amp;h=366&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2019/05/Enfield_Police_Vehicle_1525200234092_41339697_ver1.0-1.jpg?w=100&amp;h=100&amp;crop=1 100w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2019/05/Enfield_Police_Vehicle_1525200234092_41339697_ver1.0-1.jpg?w=200&amp;h=200&amp;crop=1 200w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2019/05/Enfield_Police_Vehicle_1525200234092_41339697_ver1.0-1.jpg?w=300&amp;h=300&amp;crop=1 300w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2019/05/Enfield_Police_Vehicle_1525200234092_41339697_ver1.0-1.jpg?w=600&amp;h=366&amp;crop=1 600w"/>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </a>
              </figure>
             </article>

              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list10" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>
               <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/health/coronavirus-local-impact/spring-break-travel-busy-despite-cdc-warnings/">
                 Spring break travel busy, despite CDC warnings
                </a>
               </h3>
               <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
                <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/health/coronavirus-local-impact/">
                 Coronavirus Local Impact
                </a>
                /
                <time datetime="2021-03-14T18:53:18-04:00">
                 1 week ago
                </time>
               </footer>
              </div>
              <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/health/coronavirus-local-impact/spring-break-travel-busy-despite-cdc-warnings/">
                <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                 <div class="image-wrapper square vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6436451">
                  <img alt="" loading="lazy" sizes="50px" src="https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2021/03/GettyImages-1305385794.jpg?w=600&amp;h=600&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2021/03/GettyImages-1305385794.jpg?w=100&amp;h=100&amp;crop=1 100w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2021/03/GettyImages-1305385794.jpg?w=200&amp;h=200&amp;crop=1 200w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2021/03/GettyImages-1305385794.jpg?w=300&amp;h=300&amp;crop=1 300w, https://www.wwlp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2021/03/GettyImages-1305385794.jpg?w=600&amp;h=600&amp;crop=1 600w"/>
                 </div>
                 <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
                  <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
                   <svg height="13" viewbox="0 0 11 13" width="11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                    <defs>
                     <style>
                      .cls-1{fill:#fff;fill-rule:evenodd}
                     </style>
                    </defs>
                    <path class="cls-1" d="M842 1167.5l-11 6.5v-13z" data-name="video small carousel button default" id="video_small_carousel_button_default" transform="translate(-831 -1161)">
                    </path>
                   </svg>
                  </span>
                  <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">
                   Video
                  </span>
                 </span>
                </div>
               </a>
              </figure>
             </article>
            </div>
            <div class="article-list-infinite" data-article-classes="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat  article-list__article--is-media-type" data-button-text="Load More" data-content-classes="article-list__content" data-context="two_col_media_grid--is_infinite" data-error-text="Error loading articles" data-h="3" data-initial-length="10" data-list-id="article-list10" data-loading-text="Loading..." data-next="https://www.wwlp.com/wp-json/lakana/v1/article-curation?per_page=10&amp;title=Connecticut&amp;provider=category&amp;category=78&amp;page=2&amp;context=view" data-react-component="ArticleListInfinite" data-show-thumb="true">
            </div>
           </section>
           <section class="article-list article-list--headline-two-col article-list--is-infinite article-list-tabs__panel" data-context="two_col_media_grid--is_infinite" data-theme="" id="tab-3PhotoGalleries">

             <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="797350" data-collection="article-list11" data-index="7">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list11" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>
               <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/local-news/hampden-county/police-looking-to-identify-breaking-entering-vandalism-suspect-at-west-springfield-high-school/">
                 Police identify suspect in breaking &amp; entering, vandalism at West Springfield High School
                </a>
               </h3>
               <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
                <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/local-news/hampden-county/">
                 Hampden County
                </a>
                /
                <time datetime="2021-03-12T20:05:06-05:00">
                 1 week ago
                </time>
               </footer>
              </div>
              <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/local-news/hampden-county/police-looking-to-identify-breaking-entering-vandalism-suspect-at-west-springfield-high-school/">

                </div>
               </a>
              </figure>
             </article>

       <section class="widget widget--has-z-index-stacking-reset widget_ns-article-bin" data-component="dropzoneWidget" id="ns-article-bin-49">
        <section class="article-list article-list-carousel article-list-carousel--sidebar" data-carousel-duration="0" data-component="articleListCarousel" data-context="carousel_sidebar">
         <h2 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--notched">
          Donate Today
         </h2>
         <div class="article-list__content">
          <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="427835" data-collection="article-list13" data-index="0">
           <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list13" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 899px) 50vw, 256px"]'>
            <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/health/coronavirus-local-impact/community-foundation-of-western-massachusetts-raising-funds-for-those-in-need-during-covid-19-outbreak/">
              Community Foundation of Western Massachusetts raising funds for those in need during COVID-19 outbreak
             </a>
            </h3>
            <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
             <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/health/coronavirus-local-impact/">
              Coronavirus Local Impact
             </a>
             /
             <time datetime="2020-05-15T16:47:35-04:00">
              10 months ago
             </time>
            </footer>
           </div>
           <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
            <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wwlp.com/news/health/coronavirus-local-impact/community-foundation-of-western-massachusetts-raising-funds-for-those-in-need-during-covid-19-outbreak/">
             <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
              <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_5509606">

   (function() {
	var _sf_async_config = window._sf_async_config = (window._sf_async_config || {});

	_sf_async_config.sections = "";
	_sf_async_config.authors = "";
	function loadChartbeat() {
			var e = document.createElement('script');
			var n = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
			e.type = 'text/javascript';
			e.async = true;
			e.src = '//static.chartbeat.com/js/chartbeat.js';
			n.parentNode.insertBefore(e, n);
	}
	loadChartbeat();
})();
  </script>
  <!-- LiveRamp ATS -->
  <script>
   var atsScript = document.createElement('script');
atsScript.onload = function() {
	window.ats.start({
		"placementID": "1262",
		"storageType": "localStorage",
		"detectionType": "scrape",
		"cssSelectors": [
			"input[type=text]",
			"input[type=email]"
		],
		"logging": "error"
	});
};
atsScript.src = 'https://ats.rlcdn.com/ats.js';
document.body.appendChild(atsScript);
  </script>
